Generation VI.X: From its beak, it expels embers that set the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on the bewildered prey that pop out of the grass.
Generation VI.Y: The hotter the flame sac on its belly, the faster it can fly, but it takes some time to get the fire going.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: From its beak, it expels embers that set the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on the bewildered prey that pop out of the grass.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: The hotter the flame sac on its belly, the faster it can fly, but it takes some time to get the fire going.

Generation VII.Sun: From its beak, it fires embers at its prey. Once it has caught them, it grills them at high heat before feasting upon them.
Generation VII.Moon: It will not tolerate other Fletchinder entering its territory, which has a radius of several miles.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It scatters embers in the tall grass. Then bug Pokémon, frightened by the flames, come flying out, and Fletchinder gobbles them up.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Its speed right after takeoff already puts it in the top speed class of all bird Pokémon.

Generation VIII.Sword: Fletchinder launches embers into the den of its prey. When the prey comes leaping out, Fletchinder's sharp talons finish it off.
Generation VIII.Shield: Fletchinder are exceedingly territorial and aggressive. These Pokémon fight among themselves over feeding grounds.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Fletchinder scatters embers in tall grass where bug Pokémon might be hiding and then catches them as they come leaping out.
Generation IX.Violet: Its territory has a radius of just over a mile. If any bird Pokémon should enter, it will show them no mercy.

Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Route 8 , Wela Volcano Park ( SOS Battle )
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Route 8 , Wela Volcano Park ( SOS Battle )

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Workout Sea , Loop Lagoon , Stepping-Stone Sea , Insular Sea , Honeycalm Island , Honeycalm Sea Fields of Honor , Soothing Wetlands , Training Lowlands ( Wanderer ) Fields of Honor , Loop Lagoon ( Max Raid Battle )

Generation IX.Scarlet: South Province: Area One , Area Three , Area Four , Area Five East Province: Area One West Province: Area One , Area Three Tera Raid Battles ( 3★ )
Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Area One , Area Three , Area Four , Area Five East Province: Area One West Province: Area One , Area Three Tera Raid Battles ( 3★ )
Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero: Coastal Biome , Torchlit Labyrinth , Canyon Biome
